data.eml:eml: Description of the immature stages of Sigara (Tropocorixa) schadei (Hungerford) (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Corixidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Konopko, Susana Amanda (2012): Description of the immature stages of Sigara (Tropocorixa) schadei (Hungerford) (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Corixidae). Zootaxa 3487: 41-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214572
